name: Aureate Radiance of the Far-North Scions
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  With the unblessed birth of the prophesied son, a millennia-long plan usheredin a bleak twilight.  A scheme born of cunning was shattered by foolish betrayal. The youth who wassupposed to be king took the maid who was supposed to serve him and stole thesecret treasure that was supposed to be his, only to reject the crowns thatfate had ordained for him.  In time, the king who was destined to rule Elysium went down in history as anunpardonable thief, and by the time the true new moon shone upon the land, thefar north's final wish of golden grandeur had already been buried by apriestess, who had never believed in any god, in the empty grave of her king.
